# Karthikeyan K - Portfolio Website

> Personal portfolio website showcasing the work and skills of Karthikeyan K, a Full Stack Developer and B.Tech student in Information Technology

## Site Purpose

This is a professional portfolio website featuring projects, skills, experience, and educational background of Karthikeyan K. The site demonstrates expertise in Full Stack Development, AI, IoT, and Blockchain technologies.

## Main Sections

- Home: Introduction and hero section with profile information
- About: Personal background, journey, and areas of expertise
- Education: Academic qualifications including B.Tech in Information Technology from DMI College of Engineering (2021-2025)
- Experience: Professional internships and work experience including roles at:
  - AICTE (AI Virtual Internship, Aug 2024 - Sep 2024)
  - Edunet Foundation & IBM SkillsBuild (Generative AI Virtual Internship, Aug 2024 - Sep 2024)
  - NoviTech R&D (AI, Blockchain, IoT, Full Stack Internships, May 2024 - July 2024)
- Skills: Technical competencies and programming languages
- Projects: Portfolio of developed applications and systems
- Contact: Ways to get in touch and social media links

## Technologies Used

### Frontend
- HTML5 (Semantic markup)
- CSS3 (Flexbox, Grid, Custom properties, Animations)
- JavaScript (ES6+, DOM manipulation)

### Libraries & Frameworks
- AOS (Animate On Scroll)
- Typed.js (Dynamic typing effects)
- Font Awesome (Icon library)

### Development Tools
- Git & GitHub (Version control)
- VS Code (Development environment)
- Vercel (Deployment platform)

## Featured Projects

### AI Consulting System
- Multi-domain AI-powered consulting platform
- Technologies: Next.js 15, TypeScript, Gemini 2.0 Flash AI, Radix UI, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Clerk Auth, Firebase
- Features domain-specific chatbots for Education, Healthcare, Finance, and Retail
- Live: https://aiconsultingsystem.netlify.app/
- Repository: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/AiConsultingSystem

### Todo Application
- Feature-rich task management application
- Technologies: React, TypeScript, Redux
- Live: https://i8ftfb0ekpv7admu.vercel.app/
- Repository: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/Todo-List

### Weather Dashboard
- Real-time weather application
- Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, OpenWeatherMap API
- Repository: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/Weather-Dashboard

### Chess Game
- Interactive chess game with AI opponent
- Technologies: JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3
- Repository: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/Chess-Game

### Snake Game
- Classic game with modern animations
- Technologies: JavaScript, HTML5 Canvas, CSS3
- Repository: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/Snake-Game

### NutrifyAI
- AI-powered nutrition analysis tool
- Technologies: AI/ML, Python, Web technologies
- Repository: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/NutrifyAI

## Site Features

- Modern, responsive design optimized for all devices
- Dark/Light theme toggle
- Smooth scroll animations
- Interactive custom cursor
- Progress bars for skill visualization
- Project cards with live demos and source code links
- Interactive contact form
- Social media integration

## Repository

- GitHub: https://github.com/Karthikeyan260/Karthikeyan-portfolio
- Live Site: https://karthikeyan-portfolio-website.vercel.app/
